Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class Circle
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    Author:
    chunchang The Circle class is responsible for drawing the circle, calculate the radius and store the centroid of the circle. The Circle instance is designed as a state machine: Circle only calculates and repaints the surrounded two circles after the user selects a desired circle.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
